author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: The first two images in the still picture look like meteo balloons

author: Rick Spilman
content:
Apparently, most reports were from civilian sources. From the post:

The New York Times notes that the report determines that a vast majority of more than 120 incidents over the past two decades did not originate from any American military or other advanced U.S. government technology, the officials said. That determination would appear to eliminate the possibility that Navy pilots who reported seeing unexplained aircraft might have encountered programs the government meant to keep secret.

author: Willy
content: So to me the question is. Why has it happened with just the military? No civilans bore witness to any of this?
